segments.text: What would be a good day to finally move into the house ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can pick up your keys on Tuesday night . When you actually move in is up to you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Will the electricity and water be on , or do we need to do something to get it turned on ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Make sure that you transfer the utilities to your name and tell them when you will be moving in .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The carpet needs to be cleaned , and I want to paint the walls a different color .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: An empty house is easier to paint and clean . Take a few days to take care of those things before you start moving your furniture in .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want my appliances to be delivered as we are moving into the house .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think that will work out just fine . It will help when you move your groceries in and need to keep them cold .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you be willing to help me do a few things on the day I move in ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My grandmother needs me to help her trim her roses that day .
segments.speaker: S2
